img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game set in a snowy, mountainous area. A character dressed in fur clothing and wielding a large staff is walking through the snow. Various icons indicating game controls and abilities are displayed on the screen, suggesting the game is an action-adventure or RPG. A red dashed circle highlights an area on the left side of the screen, possibly indicating an objective or point of interest.
